item.name: Debug
item.description: A collection of troubleshooting endpoints. These help determine which account, network, and identity are being used during the request.

item.name: Session
item.description: Information about the current user, including account and permissions.

request.description: Get all users.
Get a user by id.
Create a new network.

query.description: Search for invites with this accountId

item.name: Issuer

request.description: Get the issuer account from the blockchain. There is only ever one issuer account, with an id of "issuer".
Get the points section of the issuer account from the blockchain.

item.description: Blockchain requests for account type ISSUER.

item.name: Partner

request.description: Create a new partner account.
Get all accounts of type PARTNER.
Get a partner account by id.
Get the points section of a partner account.

item.description: Blockchain requests for account type PARTNER.

item.name: Location

request.description: Create a new account of type LOCATION.
Get location accounts for a partner.
Get a location account by id.
Get the points section of a location account.

item.description: Blockchain requests for account type LOCATION.

item.name: Member

request.description: Create a new account of type MEMBER.
Get all members. Supports pagination.
Get a member account by id.
Get the points section of a member account.

item.description: Blockchain requests for account type MEMBER.

item.name: Transactions

request.description: Get the history of an account.

response.name: Success

request.description:
Pull points from a child account. Can be one of the following:
1. Issuer pulls points from a Partner account.
2. Issuer pulls points from a Member account.
3. Partner pulls points from a Location account.
Issue (mint) points. Only valid with the default point type.

item.description: Endpoints to move points between accounts on the blockchain.

item.name: Rates

request.description: Update exchange rates for TLP points
Update exchange rates for TLP points
Update exchange rates for TLP points
Update exchange rates for TLP points

item.description: Endpoints for manage partner rates on the blockchain.

item.name: Offers

request.description: Create a new product offer of type REDEMPTION.
Create a new product offer of type ACCRUAL.
Execute an accrual offer.
Get all offers. Supports pagination and filtering.
Get offer by id.

item.description: Endpoints for managing offers on the blockchain.
